languages.text: "Да, может, он лгал напропалую, и вовсе не провидец никакой! И вообще кто знает, как у ксеносов мозги устроены? Он зачах, но я-то не слабачка какая! Нет, я должна это сделать. Что угодно лучше, чем кормом для демонов стать..."

traits.locale_text: "Да может он лгал напропалую и вовсе не фарсир никакой! И вообще кто знает как у ксеносов мозги устроены? Он зачах, но я-то не слабачка какая! Нет, я должна это сделать. Что угодно лучше, чем кормом для демонов стать..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."
languages.original_text: "Да, может, он лгал напропалую, и вовсе не провидец никакой! И вообще кто знает, как у ксеносов мозги устроены? Он зачах, но я-то не слабачка какая! Нет, я должна это сделать. Что угодно лучше, чем кормом для демонов стать..."

traits.locale_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “说不定他是在撒谎！说不定他根本不是什么先知！再说了，谁知道异形的脑子是什么样子的？是啊，他确实死了，但我可不像他那么软弱。不行，我必须这么做。无论怎么样，都比变成恶魔的晚餐要好……”
languages.original_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."

traits.locale_text: “说不定他是在撒谎！说不定他根本不是什么先知！再说了，谁知道异形的脑子是什么样子的？是啊，他确实死了，但我可不像他那么软弱。不行，我必须这么做。无论怎么样，都比变成恶魔的晚餐要好……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Puede que estuviera mintiendo descaradamente! ¡Puede que no fuera un vidente siquiera! Además, ¿quién sabe cómo son los cerebros de los xenos? Sí, se marchitó y murió, pero ¡yo no soy tan débil como él! No, tengo que hacerlo. Cualquier cosa es mejor que acabar como comida de daemon...».
languages.original_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Puede que estuviera mintiendo descaradamente! ¡Puede que no fuera un vidente siquiera! Además, ¿quién sabe cómo son los cerebros de los xenos? Sí, se marchitó y murió, pero ¡yo no soy tan débil como él! No, tengo que hacerlo. Cualquier cosa es mejor que acabar como comida de daemon...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht hat er dreist gelogen! Vielleicht war er gar kein Runenprophet! Außerdem, wer weiß schon, wie Xenogehirne funktionieren? Ja, er ist verkümmert und gestorben, aber ich bin nicht schwach wie er! Nein, ich muss das tun. Alles ist besser, denn als Dämonenfutter zu enden ..."
languages.original_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht hat er dreist gelogen! Vielleicht war er gar kein Runenprophet! Außerdem, wer weiß schon, wie Xenogehirne funktionieren? Ja, er ist verkümmert und gestorben, aber ich bin nicht schwach wie er! Nein, ich muss das tun. Alles ist besser, denn als Dämonenfutter zu enden ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「しらじらしい嘘をついてたのかもしれないわ！先見司ですらなかったのかもしれないし！第一、異種族の考えることなんて分かったものじゃないわ。確かにあいつは衰えて死んだけど、あたいはそんなに弱くない！そうよ、やるしかないの。ディーモンの餌になるよりはマシなんだから…」
languages.original_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."

traits.locale_text: 「しらじらしい嘘をついてたのかもしれないわ！先見司ですらなかったのかもしれないし！第一、異種族の考えることなんて分かったものじゃないわ。確かにあいつは衰えて死んだけど、あたいはそんなに弱くない！そうよ、やるしかないの。ディーモンの餌になるよりはマシなんだから…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être mentait-il effrontément ?! Peut-être n'était-il pas du tout Grand Prophète ?! Qui sait comment fonctionnent les cerveaux des xénos, de toute façon ? Oui, il s'est étiolé et il est mort, mais je ne suis pas aussi faible que lui ! Non, je dois le faire. Tout plutôt que finir en pâtée pour démons... »
languages.original_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être mentait-il effrontément ?! Peut-être n'était-il pas du tout Grand Prophète ?! Qui sait comment fonctionnent les cerveaux des xénos, de toute façon ? Oui, il s'est étiolé et il est mort, mais je ne suis pas aussi faible que lui ! Non, je dois le faire. Tout plutôt que finir en pâtée pour démons... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Belki her lafı yalandı! Belki Ötesezen değildi! Ayrıca zenoların beyninde neler döndüğünü kim anlayabilir ki? Solup gitmiş olabilir, evet ama ben onun kadar zayıf değilim! Hayır, bunu yapmam gerekiyor. İblislere yem olmaktan iyidir..."
languages.original_text: "Maybe he was lying through his teeth! Maybe he wasn't a Farseer at all! Besides, who knows what xenos brains are like? Yes, he withered and died, but I'm not weak like him! No, I have to do this. Anything is better than ending up as daemon food..."
